paper_abstract: This paper presents a method of learning novel Laplace transform artificial neural network (LTANN) and shows examples of network learning. It also contains a description of the use of the LTANN for searching anomalies in geological structures (loosened zone of river embankments). (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Supervised learning Laplace transform artificial neural networks and using it for automatic classification of geological structure
